ThingDef.label: GildedBloom
ThingDef.description: A very fragile and beautiful golden flower, engineered to be part of a large terraforming program who turned wild. The petals can be harvested and processed into a gel-like elixir which beside his healing properties it also rapidly develops a dependence on the user. Taking a very long to time and needing a mild temperature in order to bloom, adding that to the addiction problem it quickly became a rarity.
